statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_sales;
SELECT product_name, category, sale_amount FROM fashion_sales;
SELECT id, product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM fashion_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, category, sale_amount FROM fashion_sales WHERE category = 'Shoes';
SELECT SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM fashion_sales;
SELECT * FROM fashion_sales WHERE category = 'Shoes' ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM fashion_sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM fashion_sales;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM fashion_sales GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM fashion_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE category='Clothing' AND price < 30.00;
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM products JOIN sales_data ON products.product_id = sales_data.product_id GROUP BY product_name, category;

SELECT sales_data.sale_date, products.product_name, sales_data.sales_amount FROM sales_data JOIN products ON sales_data.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sales_data.sales_amount > 500 ORDER BY sales_data.sale_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price, MIN(price) AS lowest_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing';
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM Product WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, category FROM products ORDER BY category DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, parent_category FROM categories WHERE parent_category IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT category_name, count(*) AS total_products FROM categories INNER JOIN products ON categories.category_name = products.category GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id INNER JOIN sales ON orders.sale_id = sales.sale_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, quantity FROM products INNER JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date ASC, quantity DESC;
